hello and greetings from buenos 
aires argentina once more

today we're bringing you a food challenge that

with only a couple of days left in the city he

hours and thus began our epic argentine pizza tour

pizza in buenos aires is pretty iconic 
given the waves of italian immigration

argentina experience from the late 19th to mid 
20th century and today that translates into some

excellent pizzerias across the city how convenient 
that this also happens to be sam's favorite food

so with that in mind we invite you to join us 
on this epic buenos aires pizza tour as we visit

5 of the oldest and most loved pizzerias across 
the city wish us luck and let's go eat pizza
